content.text:
# Bobbi Jo Steadward

}}
Bobbi Jo Hjertaas (n√©e Steadward; born May 13, 1976) is a former field hockey defender from Canada. Born in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, she earned a total number of 49 international caps for the Canadian National Team during her career.
She won a bronze medal, at the 1999 Pan American Games.
International senior tournaments
* 1998 – Commonwealth Games, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (not ranked)
* 1999 – Pan American Games, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada (3rd)
